Package.Name: Customization_Manager_by_lgfrbcsgo
Package.Description:
This mod automaticially moves customizations between tanks when switching between them. Just like the Auto Equip mod in XVM, but for camouflages.

Features:
- Automaticially applies customizations when switching between tanks or when tanks return from battle.
- Works with Camouflages, Emblems, Paints, Inscriptions and Modificators.
- Automaticially frees up all available customizations when opening the customization window.
- The mod will show a warning that it could not apply the customizations, should a tank holding the required customizations still be in a battle.

Package.Name: Seller by JOVE
Package.Description:
quicker selling of unused items

Warning!
Don´t check "compatible with vehicles"!
Only if you want to sell shells/consumables/modules fitting to vehicles in your garage - but in most cases that´s not what people want!

Package.Name: RegionChanger by ShuraBB
Package.UpdateComment: 2018-12-18:\nUpdated server list for multi-client: updated server NA cluster, removed server CH.

Package.Name: Battle Hits Viewer in Hangar v{version}
Package.Description:
Mod allows you to consider all the hits on the tank received in battle.
You can configure the mod directly in the hangar.

https://protanki.tv/mods/hangar_mod/boevye-rany-ot-tornado

Package.Name: Auto-equip removeable equipment by OldSkool
Package.Description:
The function “AutoEquip” - automatic installation of removable equipment for the selected tank;

"Teach" this mod how he should work:
which automatic installation of removable equipment you wanna have on the tank - just put it on the tank the mod saves it

Simple Mod to automatically mount and demount removable devices on vehicles.
Equipment from the previous vehicle will be mounted after battle on the next vehicle.
(Binoculars, Toolbox and Camonet)

Package.Name: Auxilium Garage Settings by ShuraBB v{version}
Package.UpdateComment: 2. URL: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/596487- post352\n>Is it possible to adapt it to Frontline?\nFor the Front line, auto-return does not work, to adjust the hands you need to press CTRL-O before the fight and put all hands

Package.Name: Auto-equip removeable equipment
Auto-Equip consumables
Package.Description: The function “AutoOutfit” - automatic installation of the equipment for the selected tank (first aid Kit, repair Kit, fire extinguisher, etc.);

Package.Name: Auto crew return
Package.Description: The function “AutoCrew” - automatic return of the last of the crew to the selected tank;

Package.Name: Add L_CTRL+R keys to remove all removable equipment
Package.Description: Pressing left CTRL + R in the garage will remove all removable equipment from all your tanks. It will NOT remove "Complex Equipment" (Equipment that needs gold to be un-mounted)

Package.Name: Save last server
Package.Description: The function “saveLastServer” - remembering the last server which was played by the player;

Package.Name: Armor Inspector by wotinspector.com (Online)
Package.Description: When the mod is installed properly, the button Armor Inspector will appear at the garage right under the tank and above the maintenance buttons. \nClick on it and you are redirected to the selected tank on wotinspector.com.\nShots from the last battle are autimatically accessible when you open Armor Inspector.

Package.Name: Map Rotation - Only played Maps
Package.UpdateComment: added the new map "212_epic_random_valley"\nfixed the BattleReplay counting bug
Package.Description: Press F11 inside Garage (or change key inside res_mods\configs\mapcount\mapcount.xml)\nMaps sort by Battles

Package.Name: ModPack Button Support Tool v{version} by Budyx69
Package.Description: ModpackButton by Budyx69: \nWith this Button you can jump to the Relhax Modpack chat channel in game, the Discord support server, and visit our official support Forums.

Package.Name: OfflineMode Launcher
Package.Description:
This mod can start maps offline.
There is no tank and no gui, only the blank map to explore!
Only Works From Login Screen
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
How to use:

1.Click the MOD list in the lower right corner of the login screen
2.Click on item OfflineMode Launcher
-> Launcher window opens
3.Select a map
4.Click the Load button
-> The map will load
5.Press the F key
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Keys:

WSAD: move camera
Numpad +/-: adjust FOV
Mouse Wheel: adjust speed
Escape: toggle mouse mode
F: toggle camera freeze mode
R: add new camera view point
0-7: change camera view point
N: move to previous camera view point
M: move to next camera view point
P: toggle post-precessing
C: toggle cinematic post-processing mode
T: toggle temporal AA
END: Game will quit
Alt+F4: , Game will quit.
PrtSc/SysRq: ScreenShot
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About camera speed:
1.Copy the engine_config.xml from res/ to res_mods/1.1.0.1
2.Open XML file,edit ui/straferate value.
3.Save,Close.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Contact：Twitter 
alphasave1
Special Thanks : 
chirimenspiral , koreanrandom’s MODders

Package.Name: ScriptloaderPro v{version} by Budyx69

Loads mods in all modes 
 with Tidy Messenger you see nothing

Package.Name: Old Store by goofy67
Package.Description: Disadvantages: You can not buy bonds or bundles as you can in new shop-interface.

Package.Name: Horizontal compact
Package.Description: This mod simply shortens the arrows in the horizontal tree of studies, so as not to scroll the left-right research sheet, plus maximally compactly disposes tanks in the tree of investigation in width.

Package.Name: Advanced Vertical TechTree Mod v{version}
Package.Description:
Mainfeatures: 
- 11 different Layout options (8 vertical, 3 horizontal) 
- 5 graphic options 
- Show hidden, removed Premium and special tanks in techtree 
- Enjoy over 490 tanks in your techtree 
- Nice, centered nations button bar 
- Compatiblity with all screen resolutions 
- In-game UI mod settings (press F8 key for Changes, press F7 key for reloading Data base) 
- Allows preview and tank compare features for all tanks in game 

Because there are different options, you can style the Techtree using different combinations.

Original Thread by Johnny: http://forum.worldoftanks.ru/index.php?/topic/1654743-
Continued by OldSkool & KukieJar: http://forum.worldoftanks.eu/index.php?/topic/669226-
